title: Release + Docker
description: Streamline your container development workflow with Release's Docker integration.
betterDescription: Release and Docker partner to provide developers with seamless container management and deployment capabilities directly from their development environment.
betterCards:
Docker Extension

Access Release's environment management capabilities directly from Docker Desktop with our official extension.

Container Optimization

Automatically optimize container configurations for different environments while maintaining consistency across your deployment pipeline.

Simplified Workflow

Manage your containerized applications and environments directly from your local development workflow.
